title: Thai mince pork with red chilli and basil
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons rapeseed oil or any oil of your choice', '1/4 onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '1/3 red chilli, finely chopped', '250g lean mince pork', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1/4 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '10 to 12 fresh basil leaves', '2 eggs']
